title: Cheating to Live~Medical Tourism (Al-Jazeera) 2008.02.02 mpeg
description:
Cheating to Live~Medical Tourism (Al-Jazeera) 2008.02.02 mpeg

The United States ranks 37th in the world in providing health care to its citizens, according to the WHO- a standard comparable to a range of developing nations. 

Spotty health insurance, denial of treatment, and a high rate of personal bankruptcies all add to a dismal picture.

As a solution, medical tourism for treatments, surgery, prescription drugs and dental care has become a widespread practice.

In addition to southeast Asia destinations, 3rd World Mexico is the preferred destination with accessibility and cheapness being the keys.

Don?t why cheating is mentioned in the title. ?Beating the system? might be better
